title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - DC Design Concorde
description:
In this video we are going to look at the Concorde created by DC Design which has been released earlier today. We start with a review of the liveries after which we will look at the exterior of the aircraft. Once we looked at the outside we will look inside the cabin and the cockpit.

After we looked at multiple components we will start the engines and take the aircraft out for a short flight.

If you would like to try Concorde yourself download it from the site below:
https://www.justflight.com/product/dc-designs-concorde-microsoft-flight-simulator

tags: DC Design releases Concorde for MSFS 2020
